properties.name: metlo.api-key
properties.description: The Metlo connection API key to use for authorization.

properties.name: metlo.enabled
properties.description: Enable Metlo request and response tracing.

properties.name: metlo.host
properties.description: The Metlo API host URL to send traces to.

properties.name: metlo.hostname
properties.description: Manually set the instance hostname for tracing.

properties.name: metlo.ignored-paths
properties.description: Collection of paths (ant-path style accepted) to ignore for trace requests.

properties.name: metlo.log-requests
properties.description: Log trace requests to application logs.

properties.name: metlo.protected-keys
properties.description: Case-insensitive collection of field names to omit from headers, bodies, and query arguments.

properties.name: metlo.requests-per-second
properties.description: The maximum number of trace requests per second to capture, -1 means unlimited.

properties.name: metlo.thread-pool-size
properties.description: The maximum number of threads to use for asynchronous communication.
